statements: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock >= 20 AND price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_products DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing')
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity_available FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity_available FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity_available > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_available FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE quantity_available > 0 ORDER BY quantity_available DESC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, o.quantity AS order_quantity, c.name AS customer_name FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.id = o.product_id JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, SUM(p.price * o.quantity) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE price >= 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY o.order_date ASC

SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE oi.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY oi.quantity DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1

SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, oi.quantity, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN order_items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.price < 50 AND oi.quantity > 1 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC, oi.quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.product_id = c.category_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM orders WHERE quantity > 5);
SELECT o.order_id, p.product_name, o.quantity, o.order_date FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date > '2022-01-01';
